light light Genesis 1:4 god saw light good god divid light dark Genesis 1:5 god call light day dark call night even morn first day Genesis 1:6 god said let firmament midst water let divid water water Genesis 1:7 god made firmament divid water firmament water firmament Genesis 1:8 god call firmament heaven even morn second day Genesis 1:9 god said let water heaven gather togeth unto one place let dri land appear Genesis 1:10 god call dri land earth gather togeth water call sea god saw good Genesis 1:11 god said let earth bring forth grass herb yield seed fruit tree yield fruit kind whose seed upon earth Genesis 1:12 earth brought forth grass herb yield seed kind tree yield fruit whose seed kind god saw good Genesis 1:13 even morn third day Genesis 1:14 god said let light firmament heaven divid day night let sign season day year Genesis 1:15 let light firmament heaven give light upon earth Genesis 1:16 god made two great light greater light rule day lesser light rule night made star also Genesis 1:17 god set firmament heaven give light upon earth Genesis 1:18 rule day night divid light dark god saw good Genesis 1:19 even morn fourth day Genesis 1:20 god said let water bring forth abundantli move creatur hath life fowl may fli earth open firmament heaven Genesis 1:21 god creat great whale everi live creatur moveth water brought forth abundantli kind everi wing fowl kind god saw good Genesis 1:22 god bless say fruit multipli fill water sea let fowl multipli earth Genesis 1:23 even morn fifth day Genesis 1:24 god said let earth bring forth live creatur kind cattl creep thing beast earth kind Genesis 1:25 god made beast earth kind cattl kind everi thing creepeth upon earth kind god saw good Genesis 1:26 god said let us make man imag like let dominion fish sea fowl air cattl earth everi creep thing creepeth upon earth Genesis 1:27 god creat man imag imag god creat male femal creat Genesis 1:28 god bless god said unto fruit multipli replenish earth subdu it dominion fish sea fowl air everi live thing moveth upon earth Genesis 1:29 god said behold given everi herb bear seed upon face earth everi tree fruit tree yield seed shall meat Genesis 1:30 everi beast earth everi fowl air everi thing creepeth upon earth wherein life given everi green herb meat Genesis 1:31 god saw everi thing made behold good even morn sixth day Genesis 2:1 thu heaven earth finish host shalt sure die Genesis 2:18 lord god said good man alon make help meet Genesis 2:19 ground lord god form everi beast field everi fowl air brought unto adam see would call them whatsoev adam call everi thereof Genesis 2:22 rib lord god taken man made woman brought unto man Genesis 2:23 adam said bone bone flesh flesh shall call woman taken man Genesis 2:24 therefor shall man leav father mother shall cleav unto wife shall one flesh Genesis 2:25 nake man wife asham Genesis 3:1 serpent subtil beast field lord god made said unto woman yea hath god said ye shall eat everi tree garden Genesis 3:2 woman said unto serpent may eat fruit tree garden Genesis 3:3 fruit tree midst garden god hath said ye shall eat neither shall ye touch lest ye die Genesis 3:4 serpent said unto woman ye shall sure die call unto adam said unto art thou Genesis 3:10 said heard thi voic garden afraid nake hid Genesis 3:11 said told thee thou wast nake hast thou eaten tree whereof command thee thou shouldest eat children rais stead joshua circumcis uncircumcis circumcis way Joshua 5:8 came pass done circumcis peopl abod place camp till whole Joshua 5:9 lord said unto joshua day roll away reproach egypt wherefor name place call gilgal unto day Joshua 5:10 children israel encamp gilgal kept passov fourteenth day month even plain jericho Joshua 5:11 eat old corn land morrow passov unleaven cake parch corn selfsam day Joshua 5:12 manna ceas morrow eaten old corn land neither children israel manna eat fruit land canaan year Joshua 5:13 came pass joshua jericho lift eye look behold stood man sword drawn hand joshua went unto said unto art thou us adversari Joshua 5:14 said nay captain host lord come joshua fell face earth worship said unto saith lord unto servant Joshua 5:15 captain lord host said unto joshua loos thi shoe thi foot place whereon thou standest holi joshua Joshua 6:1 jericho straitli shut children israel none went none came Joshua 6:2 lord said unto joshua see given thine ye shall compass citi seven time priest shall blow trumpet Joshua 6:5 shall come pass make long blast ram horn ye hear sound trumpet peopl shall shout great shout wall citi shall fall flat peopl shall ascend everi man straight Joshua 6:6 joshua son nun call priest said unto take ark coven let seven priest bear seven trumpet ram horn ark lord Joshua 6:7 said unto peopl pass compass citi let arm pass ark lord Joshua 6:8 came pass joshua spoken unto peopl seven priest bear seven trumpet ram horn pass lord blew trumpet ark coven lord follow Joshua 6:9 arm men went priest blew trumpet rereward came ark priest go blow trumpet Joshua 6:10 joshua command peopl say ye shall shout make nois voic neither shall word proceed mouth day bid shout shall ye shout Joshua 6:11 ark lord compass citi go onc came camp lodg camp Joshua 6:12 joshua rose earli morn priest took ark lord Joshua 6:13 seven priest bear seven trumpet ram horn ark lord went continu blew trumpet arm men went rereward came ark lord israel Joshua 7:2 joshua sent men jericho ai besid bethaven east bethel spake unto say go view countri men went view ai Joshua 7:3 return joshua said unto let peopl go let two three thousand men go melt becam water Joshua 7:6 joshua rent cloth fell earth upon face ark lord eventid elder israel put dust upon head Joshua 7:7 joshua said ala lord god wherefor hast thou brought peopl jordan deliv us hand amorit destroy us would god content dwelt side jordan Joshua 7:8 lord shall say israel turneth back enemi Joshua 7:9 canaanit inhabit land shall hear shall environ us round cut name earth wilt thou unto thi great name Joshua 7:10 lord said unto joshua get thee wherefor liest thou thu upon thi face Joshua 7:11 israel hath sin also transgress coven command them even taken accurs thing also stolen dissembl also put even among stuff Joshua 7:12 therefor children israel could stand enemi turn back enemi accurs neither except ye destroy accurs among Joshua 7:13 sanctifi peopl say sanctifi morrow thu saith lord god israel accurs thing midst thee israel thou canst stand thine enemi ye take away accurs thing among Joshua 7:14 morn therefor ye shall brought accord tribe shall tribe lord taketh shall come accord famili thereof famili lord shall take shall come household household lord shall take shall come man man Joshua 7:15 shall taken accurs thing shall burnt fire hath hath transgress coven lord hath wrought folli israel Joshua 7:16 joshua rose earli morn brought israel tribe tribe judah taken Joshua 7:17 brought famili judah took famili zarhit brought famili zarhit man father abraham father nachor serv god Joshua 24:3 took father abraham side flood led throughout land canaan multipli seed gave isaac Joshua 24:4 gave unto isaac jacob esau gave unto esau mount seir gave hand ye might possess land destroy Joshua 24:9 balak son zippor king moab aros war israel sent call balaam son beor curs you Joshua 24:10 would hearken unto balaam therefor bless still deliv hand unto put forth thi riddl may hear Judges 14:14 said unto eater came forth meat strong came forth sweet could three day expound riddl Judges 14:15 came pass seventh day said unto samson wife entic thi back naomi countri moab Ruth 2:7 said pray let glean gather reaper among sheav came hath continu even morn tarri littl hous Ruth 2:8 said boaz unto ruth hearest thou daughter go glean anoth field neither go henc abid fast maiden Ruth 2:9 let thine eye field reap go thou them charg young men shall touch thee thou art athirst go unto vessel drink young men drawn Ruth 2:10 fell face bow ground find favour thi sight lord thou hast comfort thou hast spoken friendli unto thine handmaid though like unto one thine handmaiden Ruth 2:14 boaz said unto mealtim come thou hither eat bread dip thi unto us one next kinsmen Ruth 2:21 ruth moabitess said said unto also thou shalt keep fast young men end harvest Ruth 2:22 naomi said unto ruth daughter law good daughter thou go maiden meet thee field Ruth 2:23 kept fast maiden boaz glean unto end barley harvest wheat harvest dwelt mother law Ruth 3:1 naomi mother law said unto daughter shall seek rest thee may well thee Ruth 3:2 boaz kindr thi mother law Ruth 3:18 said sit still daughter thou know matter fall man rest finish thing day Ruth 4:1 went boaz gate sat there behold kinsman boaz spake came unto said ho one turn asid sit turn rais name dead upon inherit Ruth 4:6 kinsman said cannot redeem lest mar mine inherit redeem thou right thyself cannot redeem Ruth 4:7 manner former time israel concern redeem concern chang confirm hand naomi Ruth 4:10 moreov ruth moabitess wife mahlon purchas wife rais name dead upon inherit name dead cut among brethren gate place ye wit day Ruth 4:11 peopl gate elder said wit lord make woman come thine hous like rachel like leah two build hous israel thou worthili ephratah famou bethlehem Ruth 4:12 let thi hous like hous pharez tamar bare unto judah seed lord shall give thee young woman david men wilder maon plain south jeshimon 1Samuel 23:25 saul also men went seek told david wherefor came rock abod wilder maon saul heard pursu david wilder maon 1Samuel 23:26 saul went side mountain david men side mountain david made hast get away fear saul saul men compass david men round take 1Samuel 23:27 came messeng unto saul say hast thee come philistin invad land 1Samuel 23:28 wherefor david wilder engedi 1Samuel 24:2 saul took three thousand chosen men israel went seek david men upon rock wild goat 1Samuel 24:3 came sheepcot way cave saul went cover feet david men remain side cave 1Samuel 24:4 men david said unto behold day lord said unto thee behold deliv thine enemi thine hand thou mayest shall seem good unto thee david aros cut skirt saul robe privili 1Samuel 24:5 came pass afterward david heart smote cut saul skirt 1Samuel 24:6 said unto men lord forbid thing unto master lord anoint stretch forth mine hand see anoint lord 1Samuel 24:7 david stay servant word suffer rise word say behold david seeketh thi hurt 1Samuel 24:10 behold day thine eye seen lord deliv thee day mine hand cave bade kill thee mine eye spare thee said put forth mine hand lord lord anoint 1Samuel leav pertain morn light pisseth wall 1Samuel 25:23 abigail saw david hast light ass fell david face bow ground 1Samuel 25:24 fell feet said upon lord upon let iniqu be let thine handmaid pray thee plead caus reproach hand nabal hath kept servant evil lord hath return wicked nabal upon head david sent commun abigail take wife 1Samuel 25:40 servant david come abigail carmel spake unto say david say doth david hide hill hachilah jeshimon 1Samuel 26:2 saul aros went wilder ziph three thousand chosen men israel seek david wilder ziph 1Samuel 26:3 saul pitch hill hachilah jeshimon way david abod daughter aiah ishbosheth said abner wherefor hast thou gone unto father concubin 2Samuel 3:8 abner wroth word ishbosheth said dog head judah shew kind day unto hous saul thi father brethren friend said unto david aris go gather israel unto lord king may make leagu thee thou mayest reign thine heart desireth david sent abner away went peac 2Samuel 3:22 behold servant david joab came pursu troop done behold abner came unto thee thou hast sent away quit gone 2Samuel 3:25 thou knowest abner son ner came deceiv thee know thi go thi come know thou doest 2Samuel 3:26 joab come david sent messeng guiltless lord ever blood abner son ner 2Samuel 3:29 let rest head joab father hous let fail hous joab one hath issu leper leaneth staff falleth sword lacketh bread 2Samuel 3:30 joab abishai brother abner peopl wept 2Samuel 3:33 king lament abner said die abner fool dieth 2Samuel 3:34 thi hand bound thi feet put fetter man falleth wick men fellest thou peopl wept 2Samuel 3:35 peopl came caus lame name mephibosheth 2Samuel 4:5 son rimmon beerothit rechab baanah went came heat day hous ishbosheth lay bed noon 2Samuel 4:6 came thither midst hous though would fetch wheat smote fifth rib mephibosheth ziba said humbl beseech thee may find grace thi sight lord king 2Samuel 16:5 king david came bahurim behold thenc came man famili hous saul whose name shimei son gera came forth curs daughter job father gave inherit among brethren Job 42:16 live job hundr forti year saw son son son even four gener Job 42:17 job die old full day Psalms 1:1 bless man walketh counsel ungodli standeth way sinner sitteth seat scorn Psalms 1:2 delight law lord law doth medit day night Psalms 1:3 shall like tree plant river water bringeth forth fruit season leaf also shall wither whatsoev doeth shall prosper Psalms 1:4 ungodli so like chaff wind driveth away Psalms 1:5 therefor ungodli shall stand judgment sinner congreg righteou Psalms 1:6 lord knoweth way righteou way ungodli shall perish Psalms 2:1 heathen rage peopl imagin vain thing Psalms 2:2 king earth set ruler take counsel togeth lord anoint say Psalms 2:3 let us break band asund cast away cord us Psalms 2:4 sitteth heaven shall laugh lord shall deris Psalms 2:5 shall speak unto wrath vex sore displeasur Psalms 2:6 yet set king upon holi hill zion Psalms 2:7 declar decre lord hath said unto thou art son day begotten thee Psalms 2:8 ask shall give thee heathen thine inherit uttermost part earth thi possess Psalms 2:9 thou shalt break rod iron thou shalt dash piec like potter vessel Psalms 2:10 wise therefor ye king instruct ye judg earth Psalms 2:11 serv lord fear rejoic trembl Psalms 2:12 kiss son lest angri ye perish way wrath kindl littl bless put trust Psalms 3:1 lord increas troubl mani rise Psalms 3:2 mani say soul help god selah Psalms 3:3 thou lord art shield glori lifter mine head Psalms 3:4 cri unto lord voic heard holi hill selah Psalms 3:5 laid slept awak lord sustain Psalms 3:6 afraid ten thousand peopl set round Psalms 3:7 aris lord save god thou hast smitten mine enemi upon cheek bone thou hast broken teeth ungodli Psalms 3:8 salvat belongeth unto lord thi bless upon thi peopl selah Psalms 4:1 hear call god righteous thou hast enlarg distress merci upon hear prayer Psalms 4:2 ye son men long ye turn glori shame long ye love vaniti seek leas selah Psalms 4:3 know lord hath set apart godli himself lord hear call unto Psalms 4:4 stand awe sin not commun heart upon bed still selah Psalms 4:5 offer sacrific righteous put trust lord Psalms 4:6 mani say shew us good lord lift thou light thi counten upon us Psalms 4:7 thou hast put glad heart time corn wine increas Psalms 4:8 lay peac sleep thou lord makest dwell safeti Psalms 5:1 give ear word lord consid medit Psalms 5:2 hearken unto voic cri king god unto thee pray Psalms 5:3 voic shalt thou hear morn lord morn direct prayer unto thee look Psalms 5:4 thou art god hath pleasur wicked neither shall evil dwell thee Psalms 5:5 foolish shall stand thi sight thou hatest worker iniqu Psalms 5:6 thou shalt destroy speak leas lord abhor bloodi deceit man Psalms 5:7 come thi hous multitud thi merci thi fear worship toward thi holi templ Psalms 5:8 lead lord thi righteous mine enemi make thi way straight face Psalms 5:9 faith mouth inward part wicked throat open sepulchr flatter tongu Psalms 5:10 destroy thou god let fall counsel cast 1:3 ox knoweth owner ass master crib israel doth know peopl doth consid Isaiah 1:4 ah sin nation peopl laden iniqu seed evildo children corrupt forsaken lord provok holi one israel unto anger gone away backward Isaiah 1:5 ye stricken ye revolt more whole head sick whole heart faint Isaiah 1:6 sole foot even unto head sound wound bruis putrifi sore close neither bound neither mollifi ointment away iniqu even solemn meet Isaiah 1:14 new moon appoint feast soul hateth troubl unto weari bear Isaiah 1:15 ye spread forth hand hide mine eye you yea ye make mani prayer hear hand full blood Isaiah 1:16 wash make clean put away evil do mine eye ceas evil Isaiah 1:17 learn well seek judgment reliev oppress judg fatherless plead widow Isaiah 1:18 come let us reason togeth saith lord though sin scarlet shall white snow though red like crimson shall wool Isaiah 1:19 ye will obedi ye shall eat good land Isaiah 1:20 ye refus rebel ye shall devour sword mouth lord hath spoken Isaiah 1:21 faith citi becom harlot full judgment righteous lodg murder Isaiah 1:22 thi silver becom dross thi wine mix water Isaiah 1:23 thi princ rebelli companion thiev everi one loveth gift followeth reward judg take away thi tin Isaiah 1:26 restor thi judg first thi counsellor begin afterward thou shalt call citi righteous faith citi Isaiah 1:27 zion shall redeem judgment convert righteous Isaiah 1:28 49:10 made esau bare uncov secret place shall abl hide himself seed spoil brethren neighbour Jeremiah 49:11 leav thi fatherless children preserv aliv let thi widow trust Jeremiah 49:12 thu saith lord sick evil offer unto thi governor pleas thee accept thi person saith lord host Malachi 1:9 pray beseech god graciou unto us hath mean regard person saith lord host Malachi 1:10 even among would shut call children god Matthew 5:10 bless persecut righteous sake kingdom heaven Matthew 5:11 bless ye men shall revil persecut shall say manner evil fals sake Matthew 5:12 rejoic exceed glad great reward heaven persecut prophet Matthew 5:13 ye salt earth salt lost savour wherewith shall salt thenceforth good noth cast trodden foot men Matthew 5:14 ye light world citi set hill cannot hid Matthew 5:15 neither men light candl put bushel candlestick giveth light unto hous Matthew 5:16 let light shine men may see good work glorifi father heaven Matthew 5:17 think come destroy law prophet come destroy fulfil Matthew 5:18 verili say unto till heaven earth pass one jot one tittl shall wise pass law till fulfil Matthew 5:19 whosoev therefor shall break one least command shall teach men shall call least kingdom heaven whosoev shall teach shall call great kingdom heaven Matthew 5:20 say unto except righteous shall exceed righteous scribe pharise ye shall case enter kingdom heaven Matthew 5:21 ye heard said old time thou shalt kill whosoev shall kill shall danger judgment Matthew 5:22 say unto whosoev angri brother without caus shall danger judgment whosoev shall say brother raca shall danger reconcil thi brother come offer thi gift Matthew 5:25 agre thine adversari quickli while thou art way lest time adversari deliv thee judg judg deliv thee offic thou cast prison Matthew 5:26 verili say unto thee thou shalt mean come thenc till thou hast paid uttermost farth Matthew 5:27 ye heard said old time thou shalt commit adulteri Matthew 5:28 say unto whosoev looketh woman lust hath commit adulteri alreadi heart Matthew 5:29 thi right eye offend thee pluck cast thee profit thee one thi member perish thi whole bodi cast hell Matthew 5:30 thi right hand offend thee cut cast thee profit thee one thi member perish thi whole bodi cast hell Matthew 5:31 hath said whosoev shall put away wife let give write divorc Matthew 5:32 say unto whosoev shall put away wife save caus fornic causeth commit adulteri whosoev shall marri divorc committeth adulteri Matthew 5:33 ye heard hath said old time thou shalt forswear thyself shalt perform unto lord thine oath Matthew 5:34 say unto swear neither heaven god throne Matthew 5:35 earth footstool neither jerusalem citi great king Matthew 5:36 neither shalt thou swear thi head thou canst make one hair white black Matthew 5:37 let commun yea yea nay nay whatsoev cometh evil Matthew 5:38 ye heard hath said eye eye tooth tooth Matthew 5:39 say unto ye resist evil whosoev shall smite thee thi right cheek turn also Matthew 5:40 man sue thee rain unjust Matthew 5:46 ye love love reward ye even publican Matthew 5:47 ye salut brethren ye other even publican Matthew 5:48 ye therefor perfect even father heaven perfect Matthew 6:1 take heed ye 1:10 look stedfastli toward heaven went behold two men stood white apparel Acts 1:11 also said ye men galile stand ye gaze heaven jesu taken heaven shall come like manner ye seen go heaven Acts 1:12 return unto jerusalem mount call olivet jerusalem sabbath day journey Acts 1:13 come went upper room abod peter jame john andrew philip thoma bartholomew matthew jame son alphaeu simon zelot juda must need fulfil holi ghost mouth david spake concern juda guid took jesu Acts 1:17 number us obtain part ministri Acts 1:18 man purchas field reward iniqu fall headlong burst asund midst bowel gush ceas church unto god Acts 12:6 herod would brought forth night peter sleep two soldier bound two chain keeper door kept prison Acts 12:7 behold angel lord came upon light shine prison smote peter side 12:10 past first second ward came unto iron gate leadeth unto citi open accord went pass one street forthwith angel depart Acts 12:11 peter come said know sureti lord hath sent angel hath deliv hand herod expect peopl jew Acts 12:12 consid thing came hous mari mother john whose surnam mark mani gather togeth pray Acts 12:13 peter knock door gate damsel came hearken name rhoda Acts 12:14 knew peter voic open gate glad ran told peter stood gate Acts 12:15 said unto thou art mad constantli affirm even said angel Acts 12:16 peter continu knock open door saw astonish Acts 12:17 beckon unto 12:21 upon set day herod array royal apparel sat upon throne made orat unto Acts 12:22 peopl gave shout say voic god man Acts 12:23 immedi angel lord smote gave god glori eaten worm gave ghost Acts roman bound Acts 22:30 morrow would known certainti wherefor accus jew loos band command chief priest council appear brought paul set Acts 23:1 paul earnestli behold council said men brethren live
